Abstract: Frank Litsky article on the prospect for toppling records of athletic achievement in next century (M)
Snippet: Frank Litsky article on the prospect for toppling records of athletic achievement in next century (M)
LeadParagraph: EVER since Greek sports statisticians employed the ancient equivalent of timing devices and tape measures more than two millenniums ago, people have been fascinated by what athletes can achieve and what they may do in the future.

Headline.Main: On the Playing Field, the Best Is Yet to Come
Headline.PrintHeadline: VISIONS: BIOLOGY; On the Playing Field, the Best Is Yet to Come
